3.2 Top-level items: Interrupt and arguments

arguments

Function

Summary

Returns the command line arguments with which the current image was called.

Signature

MLWORKS

Structure

MLWorks

Type

val arguments: unit -> string list

Syntax

arguments () -> arguments

Description

Returns the command line arguments with which the current image was called.
